game.title: The Lost Relic
game.objective: Find the lost relic of Serendip
game.description: The kingdom of Serendip has lost its sacred relic. The king has sent out a call for adventurers to find it. The relic is said to be located in the ruins of the Old Town, overrun by monsters.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a knight title

task.description: Travel to the Old Town, located to the east of the kingdom.

task.objective: Search for the relic within the ruins
task.description: Search through the ruins of the Old Town, the relic is believed to be somewhere within the ruins.

task.objective: Return the relic to King Serendi
task.description: Once the relic is found, return it to King Serendi at the castle.
